_meta: Runtime behavioral flags. Jarvis reads these before acting. Editable by owner via /setbehavior or by Jarvis via conversation mandate updates.
welcomeMessage:
Welcome {name}. This is the VibeSwap community — cooperative capitalism, zero MEV, fair markets.

Say hi, ask questions, share ideas. Your contributions are tracked and count toward governance weight.

DM me directly — if this chat ever goes down, I'll send you an invite link to the backup channel (the Ark).

Type /mystats anytime to see your contribution profile.
